main event: On July 8, 1964, a large, elliptical, white object was sighted in the Pacific Ocean, moving at high speed and glowing with its own luminosity.
interesting points: The object was initially spotted at an altitude of 200-300 feet and was about the size of a C-5 airliner., It hovered for several minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing from view., The witness was certain it was not a conventional aircraft and expressed concern over the sighting., Multiple witnesses, including a family on vacation, observed the object., There were several reports of similar sightings in the area during the same time frame, involving bright lights and unusual maneuvers.
sighted object: an elliptical white object glowing with luminosity
witness description: A family on vacation including a husband, wife, and two children.
